fun_facts.title: Australia is wider than the moon
fun_facts.funfact: The moon sits at 3,400 kilometers (2,113 miles) in diameter, while Australia diameter from east to west is almost 4,000 km (2,485 miles)

fun_facts.title: Headphones can increase the bacteria in your ears
fun_facts.funfact: Wearing headphones for just an hour could increase the bacteria in your ears by 700 times.

fun_facts.title: Scotland chose the unicorn as its national animal
fun_facts.funfact: In Celtic mythology, the fictional creature is connected with both chivalry and dominance as well as purity and innocence.

fun_facts.title: Avocados are not vegetables
fun_facts.funfact: Avocados are fruits because they are single-seeded berries.
